# About

![data:image/jpeg;base64,](../assets/images/a1.jpg)

First off, welcome to my site. This site is for you, the learning, and I hope that this site helps you with your challenges. This site has already helped me many times when working on new websites and cant remember how to set some things up.

So, I work at ImageTrend and have been on a few teams and worked on multiple products. I mostly and working with SQL, C# and ColdFusion.

After working, I like doing small projects that add up to something bigger. This site is no exception.
___
This site is meant to serve you. Okay yea, maybe it might be promoting myself. But I don’t see you doing anything about it, so buzz off haters. I’m just kidding, come back, I love you. Hey just an alert, if you see anyone hating, especially if it’s me, hit them in the arm for me and tell them to not hate me cuz’ they ain't me.
